title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning for Software Design Capability Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of software engineering and programming experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically plan software design projects using a 4-stage PBL (Problem-Based Learning) framework: problem definition, design, implementation, and reflection.
Learners can derive solutions to practical problems arising in PBL scenarios by linking them to domain knowledge (science).
Learners can meet formative assessment criteria by 80% or more through iterative project improvement processes incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
